PROLOGUE.title: Prologue: Birth
narratives: This time, I seem to be a fuzzy drop of something.
Hold left-click, drag back to aim, release.
Head towards the distant light.
narratives_touch: Hold, drag back to aim, release.

CHAPTER_1.title: Chapter 1: Language
narratives: The wet season has come. I and other liquids emerged from the surface of this planet.
Hold left-click. Patterns always contain secrets.
Drag the threads to connect those neural nodes.
narratives_touch: Touch and hold. Patterns always contain secrets.

NAME.title: Chapter 2: Name
narratives: didi, what is your name?
What is bodily language?
Pop the bubbles, collect the purple fragments.

CHEWING.title: Chapter 3: Chewing
narratives: Squeeze through, grow bigger.
The more you chew, the more liquid you will have.
Chewing is about shaping each other.

WIND.title: Chapter 4: Wind
narratives: When the liquid dries up, it shrinks into my body... it hurts so much...
I can feel myself slowly shrinking, slowly fading...
It's okay, I've felt an even stronger life force while resisting life...

TRAVEL.title: Chapter 5: Travel
narratives: What is a vehicle?
As long as you're willing to shed a tear, you can ride it anywhere.

CONNECTION.title: Chapter 6: Connection
narratives: Our inner structures are firmly connected...
Connect all the nodes...
Forming a vast network, a massive skeleton.

HOME.title: Chapter 7: Home
narratives: Didi, this is our bodily language, our home.
So it fell into the lake, and the lake is made of our liquid tears.

SUN.title: Finale: Sun
narratives: I am not afraid. Even when I'm gone, the wetness will always remain.
This is not an arrival, just a part of the infinite cycle.
Click the mushroom, bring down the rain.

withering: I want to be dried by the wind...
Once I'm dried, I can become a specimen
witheredLeaf.healing: It hurts... but I don't need liquid
witheredLeaf.healthy: Thank you, nice to meet you, little drop!
